readingMnemonic:
The readings for this word are both kun'yomi, but you haven't learned this kun'yomi for 雌 yet, so here's a mnemonic to help you:

Just think of someone asking you to differentiate female flowers from male flowers. Can you? "<reading>Meh</reading> (め), probably not."

The reading of 花 is the rendaku version, so watch out for that too.
